## Plotting models via `geom_smooth()`

* You can easily plot the fitted model for a bivariate data using `geom_smooth()` from `ggplot2`. 

```{r}
ggplot(cars, aes(dist, speed)) + 
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = lm, se = FALSE, formula = y ~ x)
```
